categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squadrons

nodes.text: A squadron of All Terrain Tactical Enforcers within the Grand Army of the Republic was active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The squadron participated alongside the 501st Legion and the 104th Battalion during the Second Battle of Felucia in 20 BBY.

The squadron was part of a clone tank division. The walkers of the squadron were painted in dark blue markings and the unit symbol was a stylized mix of a six-legged turtle and an All Terrain Tactical Enforcer. The armor of the clone gunners of the squadron were painted in a dark blue or gray and orange markings, and clone trooper pilots operated the vehicles.

The tank squadron appeared, albeit unnamed, in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars season three episode "Padawan Lost," which aired on April 1, 2011. Its emblem and unit type were revealed in the episode's accompanying guide on StarWars.com.
